event.title: OSBA meets FSFE: The Digital Markets Act (DMA) and its impact on Free Software and its ecosystem (online)

body.p: On 24 April 2025, the FSFE will participate in the "OSBA meets" format, organised by the Open Source Business Alliance e.V., highlighting the Digital Markets Act's importance for the Free Software ecosystem, its opportunities, and the FSFE's work in this regard.
